reuters.title: COLONIAL <CLBGA> TO ACQUIRE PENSACOLA BANK
reuters.body: Colonial BancGroup said it and The Liberty Bank of Pensacola, Fla., signed a letter of intent for Colonial to acquire Liberty. Terms of the acquisition were not dislcosed. Colonial said the acquisition was its first move toward acquiring and out-of-state bank under Alabama's regional interstate banking law. Liberty has total assets of 35 mln dlrs. Reuter 
